messages.content: how to plant a neem plant

Given London's current 16.29°C and 60% humidity,  it's best to plant your neem tree in a pot initially.  Choose a large pot with drainage holes and well-draining potting mix.  Plant it in a sunny location, protecting it from strong winds.  Water regularly, allowing the soil to dry slightly between waterings.  Bring it indoors during colder months (below 10°C).  Once established and larger, you may consider planting it outdoors in a sheltered, sunny spot in spring/summer when temperatures are consistently warmer.
